cause.description:
Package of Prevention is a newly formed non-profit 501(c)(3) aimed at promoting the importance of cancer screening and early detection. Package of Prevention strives to encourage individuals to be the total “package of prevention” by maintaining a healthy lifestyle and getting all necessary screenings and check-ups. In an effort to reduce escalating cancer rates, Package of Prevention plans to conduct seminars, talks, and health awareness events to provide people with the tools they need to be informed about all cancer prevention measures.
1. All individuals should be screened for cancer.
cause.mission: Our mission is to increase the number of individuals being regularly screened for cancer each year.
cause.name: Package of Prevention
